entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Merritt 2:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 48 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 900 metres before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
